name: Jatega Classified (2019)
description:
Six people.

Six stories.

Six suspects.

In a country split by war, a leader is found dead on the floors of the Brisfast Chronicle - and it could be any one of them.

As political tensions rise, it's up to you to find the killer before things overheat...

Jatega Classified is a prototype:

The game does not have a resolved ending. 

If you manage to unlock the fingerprint draw, you will find no further meaningful content.

Bugs, particularly with music, may occur.
